Expand description

Trait that must be implemented by external metadata agents which allows the scanners to query for data.

Required Methods

source

fn search<'life0, 'life1, 'async_trait>(
    &'life0 self,
    title: &'life1 str,
    year: Option<i32>
) -> Pin<Box<dyn Future<Output = Result<Vec<ExternalMedia>>> + Send + 'async_trait>> where
    'life0: 'async_trait,
    'life1: 'async_trait,
    Self: 'async_trait, 

Search by title and year. This must return a Vec of ExternalMedia sorted by the search score.

source

fn search_by_id<'life0, 'life1, 'async_trait>(
    &'life0 self,
    external_id: &'life1 str
) -> Pin<Box<dyn Future<Output = Result<ExternalMedia>> + Send + 'async_trait>> where
    'life0: 'async_trait,
    'life1: 'async_trait,
    Self: 'async_trait, 

Search by external id. This must return a singular ExternalMedia which has the id passed in.

source

fn actors<'life0, 'life1, 'async_trait>(
    &'life0 self,
    external_id: &'life1 str
) -> Pin<Box<dyn Future<Output = Result<Vec<ExternalActor>>> + Send + 'async_trait>> where
    'life0: 'async_trait,
    'life1: 'async_trait,
    Self: 'async_trait, 

Get all actors for an external id. Actors must be ordered in order of importance.

Provided Methods

source

fn as_query_show<'a>(&'a self) -> Option<&dyn ExternalQueryShow>

Upcast self into ExternalQueryShow. It is important that providers that can query for tv shows, implements this to return Some(self).
